title: DuplicatedContext gets mixed when caching the response of a rest call
body:
### Describe the bug

when caching the `Uni` response of a rest call, the wrong duplicated context may be reused across multiple calls.

see the details in this [conversation](https://quarkusio.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/187030-users/topic/unexpected.20reuse.20of.20duplicated.20context).

Fixed by https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/pull/37077


### Expected behavior

_No response_

### Actual behavior

_No response_

### How to Reproduce?

see https://github.com/vsevel/reproducer_dupctxlocal

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

_No response_

### Output of `java -version`

_No response_

### Quarkus version or git rev

3.5.1

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

_No response_

### Additional information

_No response_
